name: To Pee or Not to Pee: Corgi Edition
name_original: To Pee or Not to Pee: Corgi Edition
description:
To Pee or Not to Pee: Corgi Edition is a platformer game developed by XxxLumaWolfiexxX. It came out on 11-08-2019.
To Pee or Not to Pee: Corgi Edition is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. The game is sold via itch.io.
